preprocessors.contextDescription: the following context is an excerpt from a resume

method.question: phone of person. Standardize this output to the format [country code]-[area code]-[phone number]

method.description: list every and all of the various job titles the person has held for each company and when they held each job title. there can be multiple job titles listed under a single company. output all job titles along with the respective information. job titles and companies can repeat

properties.description: company name listed above the job title. if no company is found, repeat the previous company name
output the end date or "Present" if none
date range in which the job title was held
duration listed in months and years that the position was held. if duration is not listed, output "none"
summarize the job description or contributions listed under the role. if no description, output none

method.description: list of schools attended, majors studied, and when person attended the school. do not include coursework or skills

properties.description: name of the school or university
return the major and degree. If no major or degree is listed, return none listed
date range of attendance. if none listed, return none
grade point average. if none listed, return none

method.description: all technical and soft skills mentioned

properties.description: skills mentioned, summarized in at most three words. return a line for each for each skill listed

method.description: all certifications, awards, and recognitions listed. if none listed, return none
